page.title: 16LYME REGIS TOWN CRIER
page.content: The Town Crier, these days, is more of a traditional tourist attraction, due to his stunning outfit. The first Town Crier was appointed almost 200 years before the first Mayor making him more important. The present Town Crier - Mr Richard Fox no longer collects taxes door to door, but organises Fetes and many local events. Even in such a small place as Lyme Regis he has still met many people from places as far as Scotland and has toured Canada and America a total of 29 times. He meets many of the holiday makers who crowd Lyme Regis every year.
